item.title: Robin Hood - Sherwood Builders
item.description:
About This Game





Robin Hood - Sherwood Builders is an action-adventure RPG with base-building elements, where you take on the role of a classic hero who stands up to the tyranny and injustice that haunts Sherwood. As Robin, you’ll fight, hunt, craft, steal, and of course help the local people thrive to spite the Sheriff of Nottingham and his ruthless regime – all within an open-world environment that can be freely explored.



Robin Hood is a famous hero of medieval English folk tales, believed to have during that time roamed the forests of Sherwood with his band of loyal outlaw companions. In the game you’re going to meet those legendary characters as well, such as Lady Marian, Little John, Friar Tuck, Allan-a-Dale, and Will Scarlet.



Robin's main goal is to help a fledgling community of refugees and rebels advance and expand. Starting with what could be described as a small forest settlement, with a bit of care, hard work, and good luck, it can end up as a town full of people. Recruit local peasants, rebels on the run from the law, and even the citizens and guards of Nottingham themselves as your new outlaw settlers.



You start your adventure with building a forest camp, which can soon be expanded following the arrival of new residents. You will be responsible for properly managing the space you secured for yourself within Sherwood Forest to build up the village.



Another important part of taking care of the settlement will be to manage the community members’ professions and tasks, training them to become craftsmen, hunters, or guards, and to manage the settlement’s resources, either gathering them yourself or stealing them from convoys and noble estates.

As Robin's people grow large in number and strong in sword arm, an uprising in Nottingham may just become a reality, ending the Sheriff's tyranny once and for all.
Can Robin Hood and his Merry Men survive and put an end to injustice? Their fate is up to you!

item.title: Meta-Ghost: Prologue
item.description:
About This Game




(Talk to Devs in discord!)

Meta-Ghost: The Breaking Show is a 3D roguelite hack-and-slash action game. Built on the foundation of "cyberpunk" culture, the game provides a thrilling and fast-paced combat experience while telling a profound cyberpunk story.

Prologue including:

· 3 Characters: "Toxin" Taisuke, "Jeer" Jean, "Yarn" Yan
· Solo Match: Level 1 - Qualifiers, Level 2 - Preliminaries
· Team Match: Level 1&2, up to 3 players online co-op, online matching available
· Off-battle Development: Operating System, Weapon Augmentation, Prosthesis Weaponizing
· Save Inheritance: Save data from the prologue can be inherited into the full version.





Play as one “breaker” (or several) in Breaking Show, battling intelligent machines with cybernetic enhancements and state-of-the-art weapons provided by the organizers in the future city of "Aeropolis." With each defeat or victory, you will gradually uncover the secrets of "the soul" and the outcome it desires...



As a Breaking Show participant with your own personal channel, you must get used to fighting on live broadcasts. Not only do you need to defeat every mechanical opponent in front of you, but you also need to strive for visually stunning performances to please event sponsors and viewers eagerly anticipating your cool moves. Their likes and dislikes will either aid or hinder you on the field.



Combining elements of "glitch art," "street art," "pop art," and other trendsetting styles creates a unique "cyber graffiti style" with a cutting-edge feel and visual impact.




Through the participant's lounge modification pod, you can enhance and modify your cybernetic enhancements and weapons, creating a dangerous and diverse fighting style. From event organizers to sponsors, you will have access to a vast array of freely combinable and customizable drivers to equip your cybernetic enhancements with special abilities, making you unbeatable on the field. The relics of other eliminated contestants left on the field will also be a major asset, allowing you to break through with their unfulfilled beliefs.




Breaking Show offers a range of combat styles to suit your preferences, whether you prefer hit-and-run tactics, head-on defense and counterattacks, or precise finesse. The Breakers in the lounge are a diverse group with unique fighting styles, providing a variety of experiences and event performances. Intelligent machines, poised to replace soldiers, agents, and bodyguards, are also preparing for the competition with flexible cooperation, adding to the already diverse lineup and ensuring that every contestant attempting to climb to the top will be successfully blocked.



As the venue for Breaking Show, the temporarily closed-off streets may appear normal, but be sure to watch every step you take, even on drainage grates or manhole covers - they could become deadly traps at any moment. Of course, this is only if you can keep your focus while taking down every mechanical opponent in front of you.




So, are you ready to make a name for yourself as a participant in the new season? After all, "the soul" is watching and eagerly anticipating your arrival.

item.title: STAR WARS™: Dark Forces Remaster
item.description:
About This Game



Star Wars™: Dark Forces Remaster has been brought to life by the team at Nightdive Studios, fully remastered through its proprietary KEX engine, allowing the game to run on modern gaming devices at up to 4K resolution at 120FPS. New and returning players will enjoy Star Wars: Dark Forces Remaster’s upgraded gameplay, high-resolution textures, enhanced lighting and rendering, and support for gamepads.

The original 1995 Star Wars: Dark Forces raised the bar for FPS games, offering players a significant degree of movement and interactivity, a large selection of items and power-ups, and engaging environments.



In the first Star Wars FPS video game, players assume the role of Kyle Katarn, a defector of the Galactic Empire turned mercenary for hire. Katarn joins the Rebel Alliance’s covert operations division tasked with infiltrating the Galactic Empire, where he discovers the secret Dark Trooper Project. The development of this powerful new series of Imperial battle droids and power-armored stormtroopers stands to strengthen the Empire’s grip on the galaxy unless Katarn and the Rebel Alliance intervene.

Key Features:


  • All fourteen original levels, featuring Star Wars™ worlds and capital ships
  • Use your ability to jump, duck, and crawl to solve puzzles and defeat enemies
  • Your Personal Digital Assistant provides you with in game information such including map, inventory, and mission briefing
  • Engaging first-person ground combat featuring ten weapons and twenty types of enemies
  • Up to 4K 120FPS visuals
  • Advanced 3D rendering enables updated lighting and atmospheric effects
  • Modern gamepad support adds a new weapon wheel, and rumble
  • Controller Support - vibration and gyro controls
  • A variety of power-ups are made available to the player, including health, shields, weapons and ammunition
  • For combat, the player may use fists, explosive landmines and thermal detonators, as well as blasters and other ranged weapons
  • Includes immersive environmental puzzles and mazes

item.title: Endless Ascent
item.description:
About This Game



Enjoying a peaceful mountain walk, admiring the scenic view and spotting a... Certain tower in the distance. Hold on... You suddenly wake up to find yourself in a smelly and hot basement, you wonder how the heck you ended up here! Turns out, you've been apparently taken hostage (Most probably shot with a tranquilizer). Now it's up to you... Yes! You Individually! You must ascend your way out of this crazy mess that you did not intend to happen as you had many plans for the next day!



Obviously you won't stay in this place for like forever; it's time to put your determination to a massive endless test! But what's your mission? Well, navigate through a variety of certain puzzles and avoid or maybe even stop life threatening traps throughout your game to ensure your survival. Pay close attention to your surroundings and other key details you must not miss. Just simply stay sharp and use your intelligence to escape.

Good luck! As you're going to need it :)

item.title: Hack.ing
item.description:
About This Game

You are an employee in charge of server computers for the government. One day, you discover that an anonymous organization is attempting to hack into government server computers. Not only are they fast, but their hacks are sophisticated. You're in danger of losing a lot of information to them in the blink of an eye, and you need to stop them quickly if you want to survive this crisis.
This is a hardcore puzzle genre that can be played simply by using WASD or the arrow keys, enter, and space bar. There are 12 hacking puzzles and 11 dot-connection puzzles to solve. Various objects are placed in the map, including rotating obstacles, opening and closing obstacles, and keys. Maneuver the green circle to complete the hack without touching the obstacles. Each time you solve one hacking puzzle, you must also solve a connect-the-dots puzzle. Finish the hack safely without touching the red obstacles.

item.title: 江梦潮音 J.M.Rhythm
item.description:
About This Game

J.M.Rhythm is a black-and-white style rhythm game set in the southern regions of Yangtze River of China. It combines the elegance of Chinese ink painting with the beauty of music. We wish you could feel the depth of traditional Chinese art and enjoy the picturesque scenes of "Jiangnan" while playing this game.

It is the first work produced by J.M.Arcady, an indie game team formed by undergraduates. We are dedicated to spreading the essence of Chinese culture through games.

One of the game's special features is that you can use our “rhythm generator” to upload your own music and it will generate a corresponding beatmap automatically. The beatmap is written in the form of JSON and allows manual modifications.

item.title: MAGIC CHAOS
item.description:
About This Game

MagiChaos is a bullet hell shooting party game that can be enjoyed by up to four players! Experience the "Magic" and "Chaos" bullet battles with cute magical girls!

Find Your Unique Combination!

Choose from over 10 bullet skill types!
There are two types: main and sub. Bullets set as main can be charged for a powerful shot.



Magical girls have unique abilities to tilt battles in their favor.
Whether it's creating ice walls or teleporting, let's aim for victory with all sorts of tactics!

item.title: Alchemy: Origins
item.description:
About This Game

Alchemy: Origins is a classic alchemy game that starts you with 4 basic elements and allows to connect them to create more and more elaborate items - all the way to reaching the stars.

Discover over 400 unique elements that can be combined in multiple ways. Can you find them all?

item.title: Twizzle Puzzle: Predators
item.description:
About This Game

Twizzle Puzzle: Predators - is the perfect puzzle game for a fun and rewarding pastime.
Your goal is to assemble a picture of cute predators that has been cut into an equal number of pieces.
Rotate the pieces to create the full picture, but think logically about the connections and solve the puzzle.
There are 50 levels to complete, and the challenge becomes increasingly difficult as you progress.
Enjoy a relaxing time connecting the pieces to create a beautiful picture of predators

In Twizzle Puzzle: Predators:

•50 levels
•Beautiful art
•Simple controls (mouse)
•Achievements
•Relaxing music

item.title: Bery'sCase
item.description:
About This Game

This is a first person horror decryption game where players will take on the role of a detective, attempting to uncover the truth behind the murder of this family. They found an important connection between this story and the "vigilante" in the report. Players will hover between life and death.
During the game, players need to face constantly emerging puzzles and collect fragmented information to advance the plot, in order to unravel the truth behind hidden and eerie events.

item.title: 13 Seconds
item.description:
About This Game



[13 Seconds] is a hardcore bullet hell Roguelike game.


You have participated in a robot game known for its ruthlessness and harshness. You must survive while dodging bullets from countless destruction machines until the end of 13 levels.
Participants who ultimately succeed in surviving will receive corresponding rewards. It's definitely worth a try!

There's just one minor problem: the only robot you have is a package delivery drone...



You must use both hands to operate both robots at the same time.



As the game progresses, more and more attack machines will appear, pushing you to your limits. If either robot is destroyed, you lose.



Various items are randomly dropped during the game. If used well, it will help you survive.


Will you be able to reach the ultimate level 13?
... And is level 13 really the end?

item.title: Skill Up!
item.description:
About This Game

Skill Up combines a satisfying 3D Jump & Run experience with a stage based progression system. In each stage, you must reach the goal without falling down! Each stage comes with a unique concept and hurdles that have to be mastered.

Features:
  • A large variety of colorful, unique stages. Stages contain classic platformer elements as well as a lot of other fun mechanics!

  • Engine optimized for a smooth, addicting 3D Jump & Run experience. Your character will move exactly how you want it!

  • Perfectly synchronized systems that behave identically on every run. Speed running has never been fairer or easier!

  • Additional mastery: After completing a stage, it can be played again to master it. This time, you shall not stop moving until reaching the goal!

    The upcoming workshop will allow you to create the 3D Jump & Run levels of your dreams including complex systems that perfectly work together in harmony and can be synchronized with ease!

item.title: Bubballs
item.description:
About This Game

Bubballs is a casual, relaxing, colorful top-down shooter. Click on bubballs to pop them.
Get your pop-streak high to earn a medal. Clear stages to level up and get more bubballs.

Alternatively, press and hold the main bubball (looks like a shooting target), then
swipe and release in any direction to propel it, popping any bubballs it touches.
Complete a stage using only this method to earn a medal.

Auto-Save and Reset: The game auto-saves your results and game settings.
To reset your game score and start a new game, click 10 times on the main bubball.
Make sure you don't miss. After the 10th successful click, all remaining bubballs will
pop at once, your gameplay results will be reset, and you will be at stage 0 again.

Symbols shown in-game:
🔇 = Game sounds are OFF.
🔈🔉🔊 = Game sounds are ON, at low/medium/high volume.
❌ = Total number of bubballs missed.
🎯 = Total number of bubballs popped.
⭐ = Number of stages cleared (indicates your current level).
🏅 = Medals earned from previous stages.
🥇 = Total number of medals held, including one from this stage.
💫 = Your current pop-streak count.

Settings panel + Keyboard controls:
🔊 F1 = Toggle all game sounds ON/OFF (default is ON).
🔊 F2 / F3 = Decrease / Increase game volume by 10%.
🔊 F4 = Set game volume to 50% (default).
👻 F5 = Reload the game in a Normal window (restarts the current level).
👻 F6 = Reload the game in a Transparent window (restarts the current level).
🎞️ F7 = Cycle the frame rate through 30, 40, 50, and 60 fps.
🎞️ F8 = Set the frame rate to 60 fps (default).
🎞️ F9 = Toggle display of current volume, frame rate, and object counts.
🏆 F10 = Toggle display of your current gameplay results (default is ON).
🖥️ F11 = Switch between full screen and windowed mode.

Mouse controls:
Left button - Click, hold, and drag to pop bubballs.
Right button - Press, hold, and move to pan the view.
Wheel - Turn the wheel up/down to zoom the view in/out.

Touch controls:
Single touch - Press, hold, and drag to pop bubballs.
Multi-touch - Press, hold, and drag to pan the view; pinch in/out to zoom in/out.

item.title: DeadballCrusader
item.description:
About This Game

Batman, The cleanup hitter of the Crusaders must challenge the Evil Demons, A baseball team summoned from the pits of hell.

In order to improve his batting for the upcomming World Series, Can he survive this hellish training?

─────────────★─────────────

Hit the balls back at the enemies to hurt them. A Precisely timed swing will send the ball back with more power and accuracy!
Bunt will block all incomming balls. Time it well and it will make you go faster!
Dodge the explosions by dashing away from danger!
Collect shinies dropped from enemies to gain power-ups!

item.title: Barbotine
item.description:
About This Game

  • Explore your progressively distorting apartment across 7 levels and indulge in the increasingly uncanny atmosphere.


  • Engage in a tense melee combat system against a peculiar enemy.


  • Dig a big hole.

Disclaimer:

Barbotine is a very short, experimental and linear game designed to be completed in a single sitting (20 - 30 minutes). There is no save system and minimal replay value. It can be played for free on itch.io or you can support my future projects by playing it here on Steam.

item.title: Stolen Realm
item.description:
About This Game

TURN-BASED STRATEGY MEETS ACTION RPG IN THIS DUNGEON CRAWLING LOOTER



Stolen Realm is a simultaneous turn-based tactical dungeon crawling looter with action RPG elements where you control up to 6 heroes, solo or through online co-op, venturing forth in adventures set in a high-fantasy, low-poly world.

Stolen Realm features an innovative turn-based combat system where simultaneous turns allow every team to take their actions at once, creating quick combat encounters that blend the tactical depth of titles like Divinity: Original Sin with the thrill of a fast-paced action RPG. Every battle scales based on the number of players involved, so you can easily jump in and out of the game even in the same playthrough!

With a highly customisable class system, Stolen Realm allows you to create traditional RPG classes or break the mold to forge a unique champion of your own as you draw from a pool of hundreds of possible skills. Make a spell-slinging assassin, a priest born of frost, or a shadow-infused knight. Further customize your build by earning and reforging loot that truly changes the way you play: wield Abbadon the Soul Crusher, a mythic mace that raises slain enemies as skeletal warriors to fight for you, or unsheath the Bloodletter, a cursed sword that grants additional power at the cost of your lifeblood. D&D-like events where attribute-based rolls will have permanent effects on your character add yet another layer to building a character that is truly your own. Anything is possible in this title that keeps compelling choices at the forefront of your experience.

Keeping the core appeal of RPGs at its forefront, Stolen Realm ensures you spend all your time, fighting, building your characters and making compelling choices that determine your immediate path or effect your character, rather than getting bogged down in side quests and other RPG-bloat. After each battle, pick your path between story events, resource gathering, shops and treasure rooms, until you get to the final boss of each procedurally generated adventure. If you’re up to a challenge, crank the difficulty up with 6 different difficulty levels – or pick Hardcore Mode with permadeath, where every battle can be the last!

Also features Roguelike Mode, a fast paced version of the game where you can mix and match builds that are simply not possible in the traditional campaign!

Carve a place in history with your sword and magic. Rise to honor and glory in the battlefield. Recover the Stolen Realm.

PRAISE FOR STOLEN REALM


“The tactical depth of Divinity: Original Sin” - GamesRadar+

“we’re losing our evenings to… Stolen Realm” - TheXboxHub

“A gorgeous looking game” - PC Gamer

“You can be a fire warrior. You can be a healing necromancer. You can do all sorts of weird s**t.” - Sacriel

“What I like about this game is it’s straight to the point. You just go in, you’re building your character, you’re getting items…and you just fight. There’s no bulls**t.” - Shroud

“It’s rad” - Sequisha


KEY FEATURES



  • Play solo or with friends in up to 6 player online co-op, allowing you and your friends to wreak havoc amongst your foes
  • Experience thrilling and fast-paced turn-based battles thanks to a simultaneous team turn system
  • Full story campaign, roguelike mode and streamer mode
  • Use over 300 skills in 10 distinct skill trees allowing for complete and flexible character customization
  • Navigate hex-based battlefields where positioning is key due to battle shrines with special effects, exploding barrels and movable crates
  • Find and loot over 700 unique items, fully customizable with modifiers, as you explore a wonderful world full of magic, secrets and unexpected dangers
  • Co-op focused design keeps gameplay fast paced and strategic for up to 6 players
  • Easy drop-in, drop-out design and automatic scaling that allows you to join or drop out mid-quest
  • D&D-like attribute-based rolls in special events that have permanent character effects
  • Fight against over 200 types of enemies in battles that will be different every time: thanks to the Enemy Modifications feature, every creature you face on the battlefield will be unique
  • A world that changes on each expedition, from frosty peaks guarded by the elusive Blue Dragon to overgrown jungles where the rock giants roam.
  • Pick your path between battles, choosing where to go between story events, resource gathering, shops, fights, and treasure rooms until you get to the final boss of each adventure
  • 6 different difficulty levels
  • Choose between Normal Mode and Hardcore Mode with permadeath if you want a real challenge!

item.title: FRUIT GAME
item.description:
About This Game

Fruit Game is a puzzle game in which you have to make fruits grow by attaching them to each other.

Fruits fall from the top of the box and grow into large fruits when they are attached to other fruits of the same type.

The game is over when the box is overflowing because the fruit cannot grow well!
Aim for a high score by attaching fruits efficiently.


[Stock Mode]

In addition to the normal mode, there is a stock mode.

In Stock Mode, only one fruit can be stocked,
In the stock mode, you can stock up only one fruit, which you can drop at any time you like.

This gives you much more freedom than in Normal Mode, so you will be able to aim for a higher score.

item.title: Little Lives
item.description:
About This Game

Little Lives is a life simulation game set in the fictional town of Littleton. Create your character's appearance and select their traits, then embark on an exciting journey of work, friendships and unexpected challenges. Progress through the game to climb the career ladder, buy a home and decorate it with your possessions, and forge relationships with the town's eccentric inhabitants.

Explore a Lively Open World

  • Navigate the town through a top-down view or hop into your vehicle for a captivating 3rd-person perspective.
  • Explore the bustling Littleton economy, with dozens of shops catering to all your needs: clothes, electrical goods, food... there's even a hair salon!
  • Upgrade your transportation by purchasing new vehicles.

Find Your Perfect Home

  • Choose from a diverse range of apartments and houses available for rent or purchase.
  • Decorate your home with a vast selection of items and color variations.
  • Discover special items with unique modifiers, like a computer that boosts your studying efficiency.

Build Meaningful Relationships

  • Form friendships and nurture social connections.
  • Find a romantic interest, go out on dates with them, perhaps even get married!
  • Collect "Social Cards" to use at events.
  • Invite friends to events and spend quality time together.

Embark on an Exciting Career Path

  • Choose from nine distinct career paths, each offering unique dialogue and events.
  • Overcome financial struggles by taking on odd-jobs, like dog-walking in the park.
  • Explore the world of stock markets and cryptocurrencies to build your wealth.
  • Stay informed with stock tips from newspapers and finance-oriented friends.

Enhance Your Skills and Further Your Education

  • Enroll in community college or university to expand your horizons and unlock new opportunities.
  • Develop your character through five core stats: Body, Charisma, Creativity, Logic & Mechanical.
  • Master ten minor skills: Chess, Computers, Cooking, Craftsmanship, Guitar, Needlework, Public Speaking, Singing, Weightlifting, and Yoga.
  • Invest in educational books to level up your knowledge and abilities.

Find Companionship with Pets

  • Select your ideal furry companion from 13 dog breeds and 3 cat breeds.
  • Show love and care to your pets by providing food and regular playtime.

Discover the Art of Cooking and Crafting

  • Unleash your inner chef and cook a wide variety of delicious recipes.
  • Collect schematics for various household items, then craft them from basic components.
  • Hone your Craftsmanship and Needlework skills to repair and improve items around your home.

COMMUNITY DISCORD SERVER


Join our Discord to chat about the game and make suggestions: https://discord.gg/zHGCcyWSQB

item.title: Movie Cinema Simulator
item.description:
About This Game

Sell tickets to customers that want to watch movies in your cinema!


Manage your own cinema in this first-person simulation game!


Defend your Cinema from Thugs and Troublemakers!


Discover the following features in Movie Cinema Simulator :
♦ Collect 20+ movies to show in your cinema 🎬
♦ Decorate your cinema in your own style 🎀
♦ Upgrade your cinema to welcome more customers 🍿
♦ Increase your cinema’s rating to attract special customers 👩👨
♦ Kick out thugs and delinquents who bothers your cinema 💪
♦ Keep your cinema clean 🧹
♦ Explore the big and mysterious city 🏙
♦ Decorate your house to be as pretty as possible 🏠
♦ Play minigames to get special rewards 🏀
♦ Recruit employees to help serve the customers 👩‍🍳👮‍♂️
♦ A first-person gameplay with lots of surprises to make your experience fun and exciting 🌟
♦ Complete achievements to get numerous rewards 🎁
♦ Follow the main story to return your grandfather’s cinema back to its glory days ✨
♦ Do side quests and get to know with the town citizen🎉
♦ It’s an offline game, so you don’t need an internet connection to play 👏

item.title: Farmer Survivors
item.description:
About This Game


Explore rural life in a completely new way with Farmer Survivors, an exciting Arcade Survivor game that puts you in the shoes of a brave farmer facing a bug infestation on their farm. Get ready for a gaming experience filled with challenges, skills, and plenty of action!

Farmer Survivors is an arcade survival game where you must withstand endless waves of insects hungry for your harvest. How long can you endure?

Automatic Targeting:

Don't worry about aiming; the game's automatic targeting system automatically focuses on the nearest enemy, allowing you to concentrate on survival strategies.

Rising Challenge:

The waves of insects become increasingly stronger and numerous, testing your skills and resilience at every moment. There are 4 seasons you can unlock as you progress through the waves!

Farm Environment:

The farm is the perfect setting for the epic battle that unfolds. Immerse yourself in rural life as you defend your precious crops. Face a variety of enemies, all based on typical farm insects. Some of them even launch projectiles, keeping you on your toes!

Strategic Choices:

At the end of each wave, you'll have the opportunity to choose items that can aid you on your journey. Make wise choices as they may be the key to your survival! Unlock and upgrade a wide range of abilities with unique effects to aid in your fight against the insects.

Weapon Diversity:

Choose from a variety of weapons, each with unique passives, and discover which suits your playstyle best. Each game is unique, thanks to randomness in the distribution of items and abilities. You never know what surprises the farm holds for you!



Get ready for an epic battle for survival in the countryside with Farmer Survivors. Put your skills to the test, make strategic decisions, and defend your farm against the invasion of hungry insects. Are you ready to be the rural hero the farm needs?

item.title: Per Aspera Test
item.description:
About This Game

Curious to find out just how fast your mind works in a life-or-death situation?
Welcome to the Per Aspera Test – a scary game that looks like those old PlayStation 1 games. Picture this: an intense 5-minute challenge, you against the unknown, racing to survive. Can you make split-second decisions and find your way out? Time to put your skills to the test! And hey, if you manage to escape, we've got some results waiting for you at the end!


WHAT TO EXPECT
Run for Your Life:
Imagine you're in a movie, and you have to run away from scary stuff. That's what this game feels like. Run, make decisions fast, and try not to get too scared!

Old-School Design:
It's like going back to the old days of video games. The graphics are pixelated, just like the games on the first PlayStation. It's familiar but also kind of spooky.

Stressful Challenges:
We added some annoying and scary things on purpose to make it extra tough. Can you handle the stress and still be a quick thinker?

Attention: Consideration for Visual Sensitivity
Please be cautious: if you're sensitive to bright lights, this may not be the right fit for you. Our aim is for everyone to enjoy the game without feeling uneasy. Your comfort is important to us.

HOW TO PLAY
Run, breathe, and think fast to survive. It's not easy, but it's super fun. When you're done, we'll tell you how quick you were. Share with your friends and see who's the best!

item.title: CANDLES
item.description:
About This Game

DON'T GET CAUGHT


The demon goes hunting and will chase you, getting progressively more difficult as the game goes on. Use a combination of sprinting, walking, and resting to escape it.

DISCOVER


Uncover helpful hints and character memories through notes and playable flashbacks.

SEAL IT AWAY


Use your collected candles to perform a ritual and seal the demon away to survive.

AUDIO AND SOUND

CANDLES has a carefully crafted original soundtrack with an emphasis on silence and tension. All sound effects in the game are original and compose a rich and unique sound palette to enhance the experience.

item.title: A War of a Madman's Making
item.description:
About This Game

This is A War of a Madman's Making: A combination of Visual Novel and text-based RPG centered around war planning and political survival, inspired by games like Suzerain and Decisive Campaigns: Barbarossa.

War of a Madman's Making is set in a fictional world where nuclear escalation has blackened the skies. You are a citizen who has been mysteriously called up to serve as Field Marshal of the Great Leader's army. Through a combination of resource management, political maneuvering, and strategic military planning, you must survive the impending war - and the purges and assassinations that will come along with it.

You have the freedom to be ruthless in your methods, but doing so too freely could have consequences - particularly if you face a tribunal for crimes against humanity. However, mismanage your resources pursuing nobler causes, and you'll find a similar fate at the hands of your beloved Great Leader.

Rein in the disaster, protect your family, and survive the purges.

Features
  • ~70k word story with 5 major endings.
  • Resource management. Maintain a military budget, popularity with the Leader's cabinet, and favor with the Great Leader himself.
  • Choose your allies and enemies. Scheme amongst the Leader's staff or even against the Leader himself.
  • Manipulate your reports when you must give bad news to the Great Leader, but be careful not to push your luck.
  • Retro-style soundtrack by Borealis (Shirli Ainsworth) full of tense overtures and bombastic battle themes.
  • An encyclopaedia filled with lore and character details - including nuggets that an astute player will find useful.

Join the Discord and contribute to game development! https://discord.gg/XxYtYqYVwx

item.title: WWE 2K24
item.description:
About This Game

FORTY YEARS OF WRESTLEMANIA

WrestleMania is the biggest event in sports entertainment, where Superstars become WWE Legends. Experience a gripping retelling of WrestleMania’s greatest moments in 2K Showcase of the Immortals, where you can relive a collection of some of the most unforgettable, career-defining matches.

AN ICONIC ROSTER

WWE 2K24 boasts a star-studded roster featuring WWE Legends like “Stone Cold” Steve Austin, Undertaker, and Andre the Giant, alongside current WWE Superstars like “The American Nightmare” Cody Rhodes, John Cena, Rhea Ripley, and Roman Reigns, whose larger-than-life entrances and signature moves are heightened by ultra-realistic graphics.

NEW MATCH TYPES

From Guest Referee to Casket, Gauntlet, and Ambulance matches, there are a bevy of new match types to experience in WWE 2K24, including support for multiple Superstars in Backstage Brawl.

PROVE YOURSELF IN MyRISE

Unleash your raw talent and become the undisputed champ in MyRISE, featuring two thrilling career arcs and original storylines chronicling your ascent to WWE stardom from the men's and women’s divisions.

BUILD YOUR FACTION

Assemble your favorite WWE Superstars and Legends in MyFACTION. Acquire cards, build a dominant faction, compete in online multiplayer and the all-new ranked quickplay. Plus, earn exciting promotional and final rank rewards as you climb the new seasonal leaderboard!

CONTROL THE WWE UNIVERSE

Develop feuds, weekly shows, and more in Universe mode, WWE 2K24’s ultimate sandbox, with expanded rivalry actions, all-new cutscenes, and support for double-title matches!

CALL THE SHOTS IN MyGM

Oversee the biggest brands and Superstars in sports entertainment as you challenge rival general managers for the top spot in MyGM. Explore more match types, more brands, and new general managers. Trade Superstars between brands, make executive decisions on contracts, and amp up the drama.

**Online play including MyFACTION requires an internet connection and 2K Account. Terms apply.

item.title: Auto Auto: Maximum Autodrive In The Alien Apocalypse
item.description:
About This Game

Do you like survivor-style games? How about hard arcade action? Have you ever wondered what would happen if a survivor-style game had a baby with old-school carnage in a fast, action based shooter full of twisted metal and brain dead hordes?

If the answer is yes, well then... get in and buckle up! The answer to "Are we alone?" has been answered, the aliens have finally landed, and it is the Alien Apocalypse. The little green men have cranked up their mind control to 11 and taken over humanity, save one! Everyone is out for the blood of the last would-be heroine!

Who is our hapless heroine? Who could possibly resist the numbing mind control that fell humanity in the Alien Apocalypse? What gallant and noble heroine could rise from the best of the best humanity had to offer? Who, you ask? It is the clinically insane, morally flexible, car-loving protagonist with an insatiable appetite for death, destruction, and nothing to lose but some questionable dignity in defeat... Lexi Lane!

Let's forget honor! Forge Lexi's path through the horde of mindless humans and aliens with flames, fire, tire marks, and a whole bunch of bullets, missiles, and other mishandled and often misappropriated alien weaponry.

You're in for a wild ride of mayhem and machine guns. You got enough firepower to make the bravest hero blush; a cute anime girl who's got a date with final destiny; and a gas-guzzling, 900-horsepower beast of a modified sports car that's armed to the teeth and a tank full of fuel, and a driver seat full of fury!

  • Short rounds of play for quick pick-up and play styles, or just killing some time (and aliens) during a break.
  • Start with your basic bullet bursting ballistics and upgrade your weapons and arsenal throughout each round.
  • Upgrade your ride of sweet slaughter to suit your gameplay... do you want to be a high-octane glass cannon, a Sunday driving shooter, or something else?
  • Jam out to the jingles... what's a little death and destruction without some rocking tunes to accompany the rocket fire?
  • Drive through hordes of mind-controlled humans, leaving their salt, tears, and dreams in puddles of blood and guts.
  • Cute anime protagonist.

At this point...what's not to like?

item.title: The Monster War
item.description:
About This Game

Welcome to The Monster War, where three distinct gaming experiences unite to deliver unparalleled excitement and challenge! A game that brings to life the heroic exploits of Lyonel Cooper, a valiant knight from the pages of "A Tale of Destiny". Play as our hero on a heroic quest to safeguard the kingdom from a relentless onslaught of monstrous invaders.

In Tower Defense mode, stand firm against waves of enemies as you fortify the castle's defenses and thwart the advancing horde of goblins, orcs and trolls. Every victory propels you forward into the heart of the conflict, but failure means certain defeat.

Transition seamlessly to Side Scroller mode upon triumph, immersing yourself in a captivating adventure across diverse landscapes teeming with danger. Push back the monstrous threat with skillful combat and exploration, but beware—a single misstep could leave you out of time and send you back to the front lines of Tower Defense.

Finally, engage your strategic prowess in Casual Puzzle mode, where the fate of the kingdom hangs in the balance. Disrupt enemy operations by strategically launching catapults and dismantling their bases piece by piece. Failure here will bring you back to the Side Scroller mode, requiring you to locate their nearest stronghold again. Three successful assaults on monster strongholds are what is required to triumph and bring an end to the war.

A passion project crafted by a solo developer with a love for storytelling, The Monster War combines innovative gameplay mechanics with stunning visuals, and all created within a limited timeframe using free assets. Every aspect of this game reflects a labor of love, inviting players to immerse themselves in a thrilling saga of bravery, strategy, and triumph against all odds. It is my hope that you will enjoy the project for what it is and be able to see the vision and potential of what it could be.

Join the battle in The Monster War and become a part of this epic tale!

item.title: There's No Easter Eggs
item.description:
About This Game

There's No Easter eggs! Totally and absolutely! Actually, chocolate is bad for you so you definitely don't want to be looking for them eggs all around 9 unique maps!

There's No Easter eggs is a casual hidden object game with over 500 Easter eggs to find. Can you catch them all?

item.title: Deep Sleep: The Beggining
item.description:
About This Game

Welcome to Winderfield: The Forgotten Town!

Embark on a journey to uncover the truth behind the enigmatic disappearance of an entire community. Did the peaceful town of Winderfield truly exist, or was it merely a myth woven by the shadows of the government?

In Winderfield: The Forgotten Town, you'll dive into the legend surrounding this place, where it's said a demon lurks in dreams, trapping the unwary in a deep and terrifying slumber. Only those with the will and wit can solve the demon's cryptic puzzles and escape its clutches.

Relive the events of 1950 through the eyes of the sole survivor who managed to awaken from the slumber, confronting the chilling truth lurking behind Winderfield's apparent calmness. Will you unravel the hidden secrets in the shadows of this lost town?

Key Features:

Immerse yourself in an engaging narrative full of mystery and suspense.
Solve challenging puzzles to escape the demon haunting dreams.
Explore the dark corners of a forgotten town, teeming with secrets and dangers.
Discover the truth behind Winderfield's disappearance and the fate of its inhabitants.
Experience immersive gameplay with stunning graphics and an eerie atmosphere.
Get ready to push your mental limits and confront your worst nightmares in Winderfield: The Forgotten Town. Are you prepared to unearth the secrets buried in the heart of darkness?

item.title: Metaball
item.description:
About This Game




Metaball is a free-to-play, crossplay-enabled online multiplayer sports game that combines fast-paced movements, thrilling PvP matches, and advanced team play.
You play as a Rider, trying to bring fame and wealth to his name by winning merciless Metaball League games with his teammates and collecting Metanium and MVP points.



Hop on your hoverboard, grab the ball with your chain, and use its swinging power to perform diverse actions.
Dunk, shoot, block, and steal the ball while using the nitro to boost your speed or perform double or triple jumps!



Play versus other Riders in different game modes such as quick match, tournament, or private match!



After each match, you will receive MVP points depending on the result. So make sure to win and to be the best Rider to receive a bonus!
The more you have MVP points, the more you will unlock rewards!



With your hard-earned Metanium and MVP points, progress in the Metapass, and try to collect your favorite pieces of equipment and items to use in the game!

Items shown may require separate purchases from the in-game store and are subject to availability. Contains in-game purchases.

item.title: Eldgear
item.description:
About This Game

Eldgear is a tactical strategy RPG set in a fantasy world.

In the vast unexplored land of Argenia where hundreds of nations are crowded together, a new era is about to begin, leaving behind the medieval era and entering the era of magical civilization.



In turn-based battles, you can choose your own strategy, whether you dash alone like lightning, advance steadily like the earth. Immersive and enjoyable pixel animations take place to enhance the battle experience.



Master area attacks that blow away enemies in a group, combined attacks unleashed by well-coordinated tags, and use EMA (Embedding Abilities) and EXA (Expanding Abilities)! Powerful strikes will power up into super special moves.

item.title: End Of Legends
item.description:
About This Game



Overview


"End Of Legends" is a blend of roguelike deck-building and auto battler mechanics. Assume the mantle of a forsaken Dark Lord, rising from the shadows to exact retribution upon humanity for its transgressions. Harness the dark arts to cast devastating spells, summon malevolent minions, and dismantle those who dared cross you. As you navigate through this merciless world, your strategic prowess will be the key to your dominion or downfall.



Featuring:


  • Dynamic upgrades that evolve your gameplay, ensuring each battle is filled with new strategies and outcomes.
  • Unique storytelling through grimoire cards, revealing the Dark Lord's past and influencing your abilities with crucial choices.
  • Epic battles against thousands of enemies, challenging your tactics and the might of your summoned armies.
  • Grand spells that unleash catastrophic destruction, turning the tide of combat with awe-inspiring power.




Cruel world:


An array of unique enemies and bosses, each presenting their own deadly arsenals and minions to test your cunning and resolve.
In "End Of Legends," the world teeters on the brink of despair, its fate intertwined with the whims of a figure shrouded in vengeance. Each grimoire card unveils a piece of the past, a story of betrayal, and a path to power untold. Your decisions within these memories forge your legacy, offering unparalleled power or unforeseen consequences. Will you reclaim your lost honor and rewrite the annals of history, or will you plunge the world further into darkness? The choice is yours, Dark Lord.

item.title: Go Go Zombies
item.description:
About This Game

Rage and rampage as a fast zombie mob!

First, they killed you. Then, they brought you back. Now you're loose and it's time for some sweet, sweet, blood-soaked payback! Kill 'em, baby! Kill 'em all!

Just click where you want the zombies to go, and the ones in range will attack any nearby enemies automatically.

WARNING: This game contains flashing lights and trippy audio visualizations. These effects can be toggled on or off from the SETTINGS menu or the PAUSE menu at any time.

Slammin' soundtrack includes The Gobs, Citric Dummies, GEE TEE, Thee Windom Earles, Redshift, Dope Sweater, Checkpoint, BEEF, Prison Affair, The Zombie Dandies, Voodoo Puppets, Untimely Dosage, Sovran, The Hydeouts, Punk Rock Opera, Sept, No Brains, Safety Pins, Bass Feens, Hawt Denim, Los Pecadores, Vampire Death, and more!

item.title: Ancient Weapon Holly
item.description:
About This Game



Holly, a humanoid weapon sealed deep within a labyrinth due to its potential to cause humanity's downfall, swears vengeance upon humans after awakening from a slumber that spanned thousands of years.

Experience a tense roguelike action game where you protect the source of your stolen power, the altar. Destroy gates that block your way and aim to clear stages. Use the magic stones you acquire to evolve Holly and expand the altar to deepen your strategies.



Game Settings
Long ago, when humans were still developing advanced civilizations, a war engulfed the world.

Among the multitude of weapons created, an autonomous weapon resembling a young girl was completed. Her arms could crack the earth like a whip, demolish any building in her path, and her red eyes mercilessly killed people one after another.

This girl was named 'Holly' by the people, and due to her overwhelming power, she was sealed deep within the earth.

After tens of thousands of years, the only emotion Holly felt upon awakening from her slumber in the dark magic ruins was an insurmountable hatred for humans.

"Humanity, perish."

Even though her weapon functions have degraded and she can now only slightly damage the ground or walls, Holly's vendetta against the world above has just begun.

Features of Ancient Weapon Holly
1. Intense combat.
2. Strategic gameplay that lures enemies into pitfalls.
3. Exhilarating action of burying enemies you've trapped in pitfalls.
4. Holly's evolution and unlocking altar functions lead to deeper strategies.

Intense Combat

In the dungeons, a moment's hesitation can be deadly.
Breath-taking, intense combat awaits you.
Face enemies with overwhelming strength and seize the fleeting moments of opportunity for strategic battles.

Strategically Lure Enemies into Pitfalls

Break the ground and block the enemy's path.
This is your way to survive.
Predict the enemy's movements, create pitfalls, and capture them all.
Strategic foresight, rather than straightforward combat, is essential in this game.

Exhilarating Action of Burying Enemies in Pitfalls

Lure enemies into pitfalls and bury them with your own hands.
The thrill of this moment is one of the game's main attractions.

Deepen Strategy with Holly's Evolution and Altar Unlocking

Defeat enemies to acquire enhancement items.
Use these items to evolve Holly and unlock the altar's functions!
Experience a deepening of strategies as you play.
With a skill tree format, a variety of enhancements are possible based on your strategy.

item.title: Dragon's Dogma 2 Character Creator & Storage
item.description:
About This Game

Prepare for your grand adventure, Arisen!

In this app, you can create your characters for Dragon's Dogma 2. Customize the looks of your main character, the Arisen, and the looks and inclination of your companion, your Main Pawn. You can store up to 5 characters of each, the Arisen and your Main Pawn respectively.

The character data created in this app can be transferred to the base game of Dragon's Dogma 2, available separately.

In the main game there will be additional graphic options available.

item.title: Stars Survivor
item.description:
About This Game

Get ready for an epic gaming experience with Stars Survivor, the ultimate multiplayer space combat game ! 🎮 Dive into a thrilling intergalactic universe where you must compete for survival and glory. Engage in intense and breathtaking space battles against players from around the world, and prove your dominance in a variety of exciting game modes. 💥🌌

Exciting Game Modes:

🌟 Battle Royale: Be the last survivor to claim victory! 💪 Take on other pilots in a fierce competition where strategy and skill are crucial to triumph. 🥇

⚔️ DeathMatch: Showcase your piloting prowess and prove your worth by achieving the highest number of kills. Be swift, precise, and unstoppable to become the top space fighter. 💣🚀

⚽ Stars Ball: Unite your piloting skills in a unique football game with spaceships. Score incredible goals and lead your team to victory! ⚽🥅

🤺 Duel: Demonstrate your individual power by facing off against opponents in thrilling 1v1 duels. Outmatch your adversaries by winning as many showdowns as possible. 🔪🛸

Global Ranking System:
In Battle Royale mode, put your skills to the test in competitive ranked matches. Climb the divisions and leagues to rank among the best pilots in the universe! Your rank will be proudly displayed in the global leaderboard. 🏆🌍

Customization and Progression:
Earn XP by winning battles and unlock a variety of unique items in the Space Pass, our exclusive battle pass. Customize your spaceships with lasers, thrusters, and much more! 🔧🚀

In-Game Currency - Planetary:
Earn Planetary by playing and completing challenges. Use them to purchase cosmetic items, upgrades, and special equipment from the daily store. 💰💫

Strategy and Tactical Bonuses:
Explore different planets on the map and destroy them to collect bonuses like missiles, speed boosts, static mines, repair packs, and more. Use them wisely to gain an edge over your opponents in space combat. 💥🛠️

Play with Friends:
Invite your friends to join you in this space adventure. Team up or engage in friendly duels to determine who's the top space pilot! 🤝🚀

Download Stars Survivor for free now and embark on an unparalleled intergalactic gaming journey! Let the battle for survival and glory begin! 🚀🌌

item.title: The Czar is Dead
item.description:
About This Game

The game describes the events of an alternative history.
What would have happened if Great Russia had won the First World War?
The game has 7 endings depending on the player's decisions.
Approximate reading time for the entire novel is 3 hours.

item.title: Duelists of Eden
item.description:
About This Game


Duelists of Eden is a card-grid-fighting game set after the events of One Step From Eden. Build your custom deck and battle online in real-time action! There are over 14 unique characters with strengths and weaknesses to encourage creative spell combinations and synergies. Will you combo slashes, fire, or even use bombs to eliminate your competition?

Deckbuilding

Fight in a mix of strategy and real-time action! Create your own unique combination of spells to take down the competition.
Save and edit an unlimited amount of decks in the editor!

Dynamic cardtridge and combo system

Create combos on the fly, adapting the scenario and what spells you and your opponent have.

Tutorial and training mode

Learn the ropes in the tutorial mode and deep dive into the mechanics via training mode.
Training mode includes hitboxes, character states, quick deck edits, speed modifiers, and more!

Custom rollback netcode

The game was completely rebuilt to support custom rollback netcode, for the smoothest experience possible.

Replay mode

Review your matches in replay mode!



Local multiplayer may require a controller.

item.title: The Creature Zone VR: Welcome To Dystopia
item.description:
About This Game

Not All Places End in Utopia...


In This FPS Horror Physics VR Game Set In The Fictional City "Rapid Lakes, Michigan", You Play As David Skymanski, A Creature Zone Department Of Science Officer. When You Start To Realize How Damaging The Creature Zone Is, You Decide To Finally End The Dictatorship Ran By James DiSonte. While You Try To Start An Uprising, It Turns Out That The Demonic Soul Which Inhabited The Terry's Pizzeria Terry Animatronic Back In Fayville Before It Was Nuked, Are Now In Captivity By The Creature Zone. What Will You Accomplish? What Chaos Will Ensue? And What Choices Will You Make? Play For Free To Find Out!

Key Features
  • Realistic Physics With Good Arms
  • Physics-Based Climbing With Realistic Feet placement
  • NPCs That Can Get Killed
  • Physics-Based Guns
And Much More!

WARNING:

This Game Has Flashing Lights, Swearing, Scares, And Blood, So Be Careful. This Game Can Also Cause Motion Sickness, So Also Beware Of This.

item.title: Dungeon Keeper Gold™
item.description:
About This Game

Being the Dungeon Keeper and all, this is your home, too. And it’s your business to take these loathsome creatures of darkness and hone them into screaming, frothing, clawing forces of destruction. Lure them in with food and the promise of dank and fetid places to sleep. Keep them in line with the back of your hand and the threat of dire consequences. Pit their scaly hides against the best that the Forces of Good can muster, and they’ll die for you as they rip steaming entrails out of the hapless heroes.

It’s a degenerate and nasty job…and you love it. Yes, home is where your heart is. In a box. Packed in salt. That's right — Dungeon Keeper, Bullfrog's classic dungeon management strategy, gives you no extra credit for having any morals. After all, the underworld isn't black and white!

Key features:

  • Revolutionary game packed with tons of dark humor, an impressive variety of hellish creatures, and highly addictive gameplay
  • Build your dungeon & protect it with a labyrinth of dark corridors, a web of deadly traps, an arsenal of powerful spells, and an army of bloodthirsty demons
  • A refreshing title for someone tired of rescuing princesses, saving worlds, and all that love, happiness, and political correctness junk. Just this once, be the bad guy!
